1 var assert = require('assert'),
  2   GetResultsArray = require('./../../resultset/Result2Array').RowsArray,
  3   GetResultsColumnNamesArray = require('./../../resultset/Result2Array').ColumnNamesArray,
  4   GetResultsColumnTypesArray = require('./../../resultset/Result2Array').ColumnTypesArray,
  5   GetResultsCount = require('./../../resultset/Result2Array').TotalRowsCount,
  6   GetResultsObjectsArrays = require('./../../resultset/Result2Array').ObjectsArray;
  7 
  8 
  9 var json_str = '{"ColumnNames":["s_name","f_name"],' +
 10   '"ColumnDataTypes":["char","string"],' +
 11   '"RowsCount":99,' +
 12   '"ColumnValues":[["X","Mixed"],["W","Woman"],["M","Man"]]}';
 13 
 14 console.log('Unit test ' + module.filename.toString() + ' started...');
 15 
 16 assert.equal(GetResultsArray(json_str).toString(), 'X,Mixed,W,Woman,M,Man');
 17 assert.equal(GetResultsColumnNamesArray(json_str).toString(), 's_name,f_name');
 18 assert.equal(GetResultsColumnTypesArray(json_str).toString(), 'char,string');
 19 assert.equal(GetResultsCount(json_str), 99);
 20 
 21 var objectsArray = GetResultsObjectsArrays(json_str);
 22 assert.equal(objectsArray[0].s_name, 'X');
 23 assert.equal(objectsArray[0].f_name, 'Mixed');
 24 assert.equal(objectsArray[1].s_name, 'W');
 25 assert.equal(objectsArray[1].f_name, 'Woman');
 26 assert.equal(objectsArray[2].s_name, 'M');
 27 assert.equal(objectsArray[2].f_name, 'Man');
 28 
 29 console.log('Unit test ended OK.');
 30
